category.name: PSM
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: BOMCompareVisibleModes
preference.preference_description: Determines which compare modes display in the BOM Compare dialog box and are returned by the BOM_compare_ask_modes ITK function. If this preference is removed, the default setting is used. Valid Values: IMAN_bcm_single_level_seq IMAN_bcm_single_level IMAN_bcm_var_level_seq IMAN_bcm_var_level IMAN_bcm_ext_var_level_seq IMAN_bcm_ext_var_level IMAN_bcm_lowest_level_seq IMAN_bcm_lowest_level IMAN_bcm_every_level Use the following compare modes for item-based logical BOM (LBOM) compares: IMAN_lbcm_var_level IMAN_lbcm_single_level IMAN_lbcm_lowest_level Use the following compare modes for occurrence-based logical BOM (LBOM) compares: IMAN_lbcm_var_level_occ IMAN_lbcm_single_level_occ Any custom compare mode must also be listed as a value in order for the mode to display in the BOM Compare dialog box.
